title: Container
description: Learn about the container component for structuring your content.

meta.title: LNGRZUI - Container Documentation
meta.description: Learn about the container component for structuring your content.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Container page showcases the Container component, which provides a container element to wrap and style your content.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Container component, and place the child components you want to display within the Container.
